product.name: Oracle EBS R12 SCM Training
product.description: Oracle R12 SCM (Supply Chain Management) is an industry-leading solution in the Oracle R12 ERP family. It allows companies to build World-class Value-chains for maximum growth. Oracle R12 Apps SCM integrates and automates all supply chain processes from Designing, Planning and Procurement to Manufacturing and fulfillment to give a complete set of solutions. It has a Unified data model with the best-driven principles, accurate view of each Supply chain.
